attributes.action: Create a door or window sticker legally forbidding door canvassers/leafleters
attributes.additional_details: Protect old people and save most people from door salespeople/travelling roofers etc. or from wads of unwanted leaflets by creating a symbol that can be printed on a door or window sticker that when displayed legally forbids door canvassing and leaflet distributors (even a non-english speaking leaflet distributor could learn the meaning of a symbol). £50 fine for each door.
